author: JamesWTruher
body:
Create a local variable for determining whether test should be skipped
Also, change depth of export-clixml to speed up tests

PSDefaultParameterValues did not get set back properly, so we had about 1500 tests which did not get run as expected. Since there's only a single test which needed to be skipped, I changed the logic to use `-skip` instead
title: Change test to not set PSDefaultParameterValues
